mutants.code:
def is_substring(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower().replace(' ', '')
    s2 = s2.lower().replace(' ', '')
    return s2 not in s1

def is_substring(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower().replace('', '')
    s2 = s2.lower().replace(' ', '')
    return s2 in s1

def is_substring(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower().replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    s2 = s2.lower().replace(' ', '')
    return s2 in s1

def is_substring(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower().replace(' ', '')
    s2 = s2.lower().replace('', '')
    return s2 in s1

def is_substring(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower().replace(' ', '')
    s2 = s2.lower().replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    return s2 in s1
